selected_quotes: I think it's relevant (due to recent Twitch news) to re-share the paper I wrote on Let's Play/livestreams fair use
For those interested, I've finally finished my paper on Let's Plays and fair use, it can be found here
@gamasutra thanks for doing great reporting, helped a lot in writing my paper on fair use and Let's Plays
@xor as a copyright activist, I think you might be interested in the paper I just wrote re YouTube and fair use

citation.title: Fair Play: Copyright Issues and Fair Use in Youtube
